title: Person with Blond Hair

adjectives: Being or having light colored skin and hair and usually blue or grey eyes
Of, relating to, or denoting a member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
Being the sex (of plant or animal) that produces gametes (spermatozoa) that perform the fertilizing function in generation

A single physical human being as a legal subject, as opposed to a legal person such as a corporation.
A human; someone susceptible to death.

A human being.
A person that will die eventually.
A being, such as a human, that has certain capacities or attributes constituting personhood

An individual; usually a human being.
A light and yellowish, brownish or golden hair color.
A person of fair hair.

A person with such hair.
A person with dark blond hair.

Blond or blonde, or fair hair, is a hair color characterized by low levels of the dark pigment eumelanin.
A woman with blond-coloured hair.
Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
An adult male human.

An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A human member of the masculine sex or gender.
An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)

description:
A person with blond hair. This emoji maintains blond hair no matter which skin tone is chosen. This emoji may be used to talk about blonds in a gender-inclusive way.

Previously displayed as a man with blond hair on all platforms, though shown as a woman with blond hair in earliest Google, Microsoft, and Samsung designs.

Variants include üë±‍‚ôÄÔ∏è Woman with Blond Hair and üë±‍‚ôÇÔ∏è Man with Blond Hair.
apple_vendor_description: The person with blond hair emoji on Apple devices is characterized by its bright, sun-kissed locks that catch the light with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading. The smooth gradients and soft rounded edges of the face create a friendly and approachable individual. This emoji, with its cheerful appearance, is often used to represent youthfulness, optimism, or simply to add a touch of lightheartedness to conversations.
